name: formalizes
value: formalizes the mathematical expression of the Coherence Norm Axiom
description: The Coherence Norm Axiom resource formalizes the definition of the Euclidean norm on the prime coordinate space as ‖v‖ = √(∑_p v(p)²), along with its key properties of non-negativity, homogeneity, triangle inequality, and the Pythagorean property that proves prime factorization achieves minimal complexity
